name: ml-app-dev-runner
description: Development runner for ML Flask + React app

scripts.dev:windows: start "Flask Backend" cmd /k "cd backend-flask && python app.py" && timeout 2 && start "React Frontend" cmd /k "cd frontend-react && npm start"
scripts.dev:powershell: powershell -Command "Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd backend-flask; python app.py' -WindowStyle Normal; Start-Sleep 2; Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList '-NoExit', '-Command', 'cd frontend-react; npm start' -WindowStyle Normal"
scripts.install-all: cd backend-flask && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend-react && npm install
